Home » 40P16 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
40 Maggārammaṇattika, Hetuduka
Maggārammaṇattika, Hetuduka
82.
213Maggārammaṇaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañcatiṃsa, ārammaṇe chabbīsa…pe…  avigate pañcatiṃsa.
214Maggārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namaggahetuko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā chabbīsa…pe…  avigate chabbīsa.
